items.title: Classic & Contemporary Chignon Hairstyle Tutorials
items.headline: Work with ease and confidence as you master skills that keep you in high demand whether you're a pro or novice!
objectives_summary: Chignons are very versatile and popular! You will learn the skills to bring smiles to your clients and friends!
Professionals will be able to ask for more money as their expertise grows and demand for their services increase.
You will be able to have better informed conversations with your clients that will result in more services, excitement, and greater loyalty.

items.title: Lash Lift Beginner Course
items.headline: Learn the basic steps and outline in creating a perfect lash lift
objectives_summary: Lash Lift Tutorial Course
This lash lift tutorial course is addressed to beauty therapists, lash technicians and those who is interested in learning skills.
Lash preparation, work station set up, maintain infection control, tools and protocols.

items.title: Makeup Artistry Masterclass - Eye Makeup : beginner to Pro

visible_instructors.name: Aishwarya
visible_instructors.title: Aishwarya k
visible_instructors.job_title: Beauty instructor & Youtuber, Model, Actor, Emcee

items.headline: Learn how to do classy magazine cover-page like smokey & glitter eye looks perfectly like a Pro
objectives_summary: 1) You will learn all the basic techniques along with some pro tricks on How to do the most intricate of smokey & glitter eyelooks In the most easiest manner.

2) Creatively The approach for this course is How to imitate a piece of fabric's onto our eyelids. Meaning how to translate the pigment, texture, transparency or opacity of the fabric onto our eye shadows.
3) How to work with glitters easily with No mess no fuss. How to work with glitters in a long lasting way.
